pullRequest.title: 1872357: [RFE] Filter syspurpose SLA values available to an Owner if the SLA is exempt

nodes.bodyText: This will make it so that every single syspurpose attribute of this product will get ignored when the product has Product.Attributes.SUPPORT_LEVEL_EXEMPT set to true. We only want the SLA attribute to be ignored, so this if statement should be if (type == SystemPurposeAttributeType.SERVICE_LEVEL && slaExempt)

commit.message: 1872357: [RFE] Filter syspurpose SLA values available to an Owner if the SLA is exempt
